composeRef.description: Reference to a compose file on disk.

path.description: Path to a compose.yaml (relative or absolute).

input.description: Initial state supplied to the compose under test.

expected.description: Expected output state after the compose completes.

bindings.description: Optional contract bindings to inject before execution.

axioms.description: Optional axiom implementations or overrides required by the compose.

failFast.description: Stop on first mismatch instead of collecting all diffs.

metadata.description: Arbitrary metadata forwarded to the checker implementation.
